references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of Neural ODEs, which is the foundation of many of the methods explored in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of residual networks, which are fundamental to the architecture of the Transformer and its derivatives.
This paper introduced the Transformer architecture, which is the main model used in this paper.

references.paper_title: ODE transformer: An ordinary differential equation-inspired model for sequence generation
references.reason: This paper directly inspired the current work, applying high-order ODE methods to improve the Transformer.

references.paper_title: A proposal on machine learning via dynamical systems
references.reason: This paper established the connection between ResNet and ODEs, providing theoretical grounding for many of the approaches explored in the current paper.
